column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////In town for just a few days with my boyfriend for a concert and decided to check this place out for a quick bite to eat and a few beers. From the outside looking in
column2: this place seems like more of an upscale bar with lots of business men
column3: but when you walk in everyone is very welcoming and nice. Our waiters name was Sam
column4: he was very kind and offered a few suggestions for casual drinks in the area.
